def _ans(n, ret):
    if n == 0:
        print ret

    for i in xrange(n, 0, -1):
        if i > ret[-1]:
            continue
        ret.append(i)
        _ans(n - i, ret)
        ret.pop()

def ans(n, ret):
    for i in xrange(n - 1, 0 , -1):
        ret.append(i)
        _ans(n - i, ret)
        ret.pop()

ret = []
ans(8, ret)
